page.title: 04A DOCTOR'S DAY: PART 2
page.content:
Sometimes he has his dinner at the canteen and sometimes he goes home.Then he goes round his two wards discussing the state of the patients with the consultant till 5pm.Wednesday starts with a visit to the Labour room to see whether any patients need attention and attends to them.At 9am he goes to the Gyneacology department and at 1pm he goes to the Operating Theatre.He goes home at 1pm and has the rest of the day off. On Friday morning he goes on a ward round. At 10.30am he goes to the Post Natal clinic.At 2pm he goes to the Coloscopy clinic.
{(Written by Dushy Senathirajah {aged 11 years ).}
